ygData.subject: Re: shining star of light
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes you can trade, sell or whatever with the Shining Star.  All it says when you right click it is LORE nothing less such as No Drop so you can trade it
ygData.messageBody:
Yes you can trade, sell or whatever with the Shining Star. All it says when
you right click it is "LORE" nothing less such as "No Drop" so you can trade
it once you get it.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> Is the shining star of light No Drop? I was thinking of making a
> character in Qeynos, trying to get the shing star and then running
> to Freeport to give it to my main character? Is this possible at all?
